convoName: Idol - Second Story Beat: Killing Corrupt Manager - Outside of Factory (Phase 3)

lines.line: This is the factory that I was made in! Ahh, brings back memories!
Of course not, but I did spend a lot of time here while they tweaked my personality!
We have to go in! I wanna see the other idols being made and all that cool tech that comes with them.
Aw come onnn, you’re no fun! Just a peek!
Pleeeeeeassssseee! if you don’t, I’m gonna just keep asking the whooooole way to IRIS.
